completion: Otanisan: Unicorn name, from Tohoku, 2m tall, 100kg, first unicorn-type player in baseball history, can both pitch and hit, called "Alien" and "Gabrias" because of his ability, speaks Japanese, English and Spanish, magic power around him causes symptoms in the general population, 160kg in high school. Throws NPB draft pick, rookie of the year in MLB, uses magic of big fly, magic SFF, stiff straight, super variable slider, can DH disarm and intimidate, weakness is tomatoes.
